name: Space Shooter (itch) (Sunfly Studios)
description:
It was a normal day at planet earth, everybody doing their daily lives. Until suddenly,  every news media began sharing and spreading news about unrecognised ships being detected up in space. These ships were getting closer as time passes, causing some fear to the population, as well as generating a big set of rumours as to why this is happening. 

The "Atom" station began investigating this case. And it didn't take long to realise that these mysterious ships want to destroy planet earth. The CEO of "Atom" rapidly recruited every personnel they had available. Not too long after, you were chosen as the one. Your new mission is, go to space and protect the planet and its civilians against these mysterious ships!

Game features:

  • The game saves your progress.
  • A game shop: Choose up to 4 different ships to customise and conquer!
  • Can be played with mouse alone.

*Controls are in game*

Special thanks to:

CRAFTPIX.net, GrafxKid, and ansimuz for the sprites!

Patrick de Arteaga,  and VELDA for the music!

The game is still in Beta stage, meaning that his game may receive fixes in the future!
